summary: ITEM 1. BUSINESS COMPANY OVERVIEW IDEXX was incorporated in Delaware in 1983. We develop, manufacture, and distribute products and provide services primarily for the companion animal veterinary, livestock and poultry, dairy and water testing industries. We also provide human medical point-of-care and laboratory diagnostics. Our primary products and services are: • Point-of-care veterinary diagnostic products, comprised of instruments, consumables, and rapid assay test kits; • Veterinary reference laboratory diagnostic and consulting services; • Practice management and diagnostic imaging systems and services used by veterinarians; • Health monitoring, biological materials testing, laboratory diagnostic instruments, and services used by the biomedical research community; • Diagnostic and health-monitoring products for livestock, poultry, and dairy; • Products that test water for certain microbiological contaminants; and • Point-of-care electrolytes and blood gas analyzers.
